description:
misc/emacs/go-lang.el: Fix restoration of multiple windows in a frame after gofmt
If a frame has multiple windows then the windows must all be restored
after gofmt has finished and the old windows must be restored.
Before this fix, only the Go code edit window would be left.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Please complete a CLA as described at
http://golang.org/doc/cotnribute.html#copyright

Thanks.

Also, it looks like a level of indentation is missing.
Could you please add that?

Russ

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM

Sorry for the delay.  It looks like your merge
clobbered some new godoc-related functionality.
I will put it back before submitting.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=abd1ef448f58 ***

misc/emacs/go-lang.el: Fix restoration of multiple windows in a frame after gofmt
If a frame has multiple windows then the windows must all be restored
after gofmt has finished and the old windows must be restored.
Before this fix, only the Go code edit window would be left.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
